name: Global uniques
uniques: Triggers the following global alert: [Expedition and Garrison Working mod's Tutorial: Garrisoning units to mod resources(such a Gold Deposit), you can gain any stat instantly(but No tile yield occurs). Garrison lots of units and get lots of bonuse stats! That's this Expedition and Garrison Working mod. The amount earned is as follows. 2 to 4 Gold from Gold Deposit tile, 2 to 4 Science from Science Deposit tile, 2 to 4 Culture from Culture Deposit tile, 1 to 3 Faith from Faith Deposit tile, 4 to 6 Gold from Great Gold Deposit tile] <upon entering the [Ancient era]> <for [Barbarians]>
